item.title: Labor market growth slows dramatically in August with U.S. adding just 54,000 jobs, ADP says
item.description: U.S. private-sector hiring rose less than expected in August, according to ADP.

item.title: Job openings data falls to levels rarely seen since pandemic
item.description: The Job Openings and Labor Turnover report showed less than 7.2 million listings in July.

item.title: Euro zone inflation rises to hotter-than-expected 2.1% in August
item.description: Economists polled by Reuters had expected the rate to remain unchanged from July, at 2%.

item.title: Trump keeps threatening to punish Putin. Here's what's holding him back
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump says he'll punish Russia if Moscow doesn't agree to peace talks with Ukraine. Yet, he hasn't pushed the button, so far.

item.title: Here's how the U.S. Open's signature Honey Deuce cocktail price stacks up against inflation
item.description: CNBC compared the Honey Deuce's price growth since 2015 against the CPI basket.
